summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARK Protocol website - Solana wallet verification system. Fixed critical JavaScript error in HowItWorks component. All core functionality working correctly.

passed_tests: Wallet verification with valid Wrapped SOL address
Frontend page loading with dark theme
Hero section with ASCII logo and terminal preview
Verification section with input and verify button
How It Works section with 4 steps
Footer with links and social icons
Copy address and Solscan link buttons
Result cards showing correct styling for safe/risky/invalid
